Description:
Calling All Holiday Property Investors!
Positioned in an idyllic location only 170m from the Anderson Road Boat Ramp, and beautiful sheltered bay beach - is this 4 bedroom townhouse.
The property offers excellent opportunity as a holiday rental investment, and has been appraised by a local Holiday rental Management company with the potential to achieve up to $25,000 per annum (appraisal information available for potential purchasers).
On the lower level, you will find 3 bedrooms, all with built in robes, a family bathroom, european laundry and internal access to the single garage.
Upstairs, is an open plan living, kitchen, dining, which leads out to a north facing balcony complete with glimpses of the bay - the perfect spot for summer barbecues or an evening cocktail. The master bedroom also with built in robes and ensuite, complete the home.
Also featuring:-
Split system heating/cooling
Ducted vacuum
Outdoor storage area
Alarm system
NBN available
A great spot to live, or an attractive property to add to your investment portfolio, the property is separately titled, no body corporate fees, and not only offers great holiday rental potential - but permanent rental also.
Contact us today to arrange an inspection!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Phillip Island.
Insights: 1C Hartley Street, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Rare and exclusive location
This rare, flat parcel of land in an exclusive location is ready and waiting for the lucky new owner to build their dream home (STCA).
In a quiet, leafy street it is only a very short walk to the beach at the end of the street or a quick stroll up to the cafes and restaurants of the main street.
Approximately 605sqm in size it is very flat with all services available except gas.
One of the last remaining blocks in the area, don't miss it.

Description:
Property Under Offer - Open Home for Friday 10/01/20 Cancelled
Large family, or lots of visitors? Then look no further than this brick 5 bedroom home situated in a quiet location in Cowes.
Positioned on a 517sqm approx. allotment, walking distance to Cowes beach, and to Thompson Avenue, this single level residence represents a great opportunity for either permanent or holiday living.
The neatly presented home features a master bedroom, with ensuite and built in robe, and another 4 generous sized bedrooms also offering built in robes. There is a spacious central open plan living zone, with lounge, dining and kitchen. The kitchen boasting induction cooktop, underbench oven and dishwasher. There is a family bathroom and separate laundry completing the floorplan.
The home also features a cozy slow combustion fire and split system heating and cooling for year round comfort.
A double garage offers internal access, and a single roller door to access the rear yard. The low maintenance back garden requires very little work, freeing up your weekends to enjoy everything that Phillip Island has to offer.
This property would also be attractive to investors, who are looking for a well constructed home - with great rental potential.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Neat, comfortable and cosy!
Set over two levels and located in the popular Red Rocks area of Cowes is an opportunity that offers plenty of potential.
Downstairs features a spacious second living area, laundry and bathroom.
The upper level comprises of a separate living, kitchen and dining area, three robed bedrooms and main bathroom. There is also access to the upstairs balcony overlooking the front yard.
Other features include split system heating and cooling, dishwasher, electric cooking and single garage.
All of this is set within a generous 684sqm approx fenced allotment with established surrounds.

Description:
Retreat into a relaxed lifestyle
Backing onto reserve land, this home is equipped with everything you have been looking for in a permanent home, investment property or holiday house.
Entering the home you are greeted with a spacious living zone sweeping into the family area. The master bedroom is situated at the front of the house to maintain ultimate privacy featuring a walk in robe and ensuite.
Continuing through to the kitchen which features an open plan living/dining with ample light through the large north facing double sliding doors.
The rear of the property includes 3 spacious bedrooms, all with built in robes, and serviced by a central bathroom with separate toilet. The laundry provides access through to the North facing patio which is under cover and leads to a fully fenced yard perfect for the kids to play or keep your furry friends safe.
The double garage has an electric door and ample space for extra parking in the long driveway. Additional features on the property include a central split system, access through to a courtyard from dining area, and an abundance of natural light throughout.
The home backs onto the Blue Gum Reserve which is set among 6.6 hectares of native blue gum trees and open space. It is a fabulous spot to enjoy nature with your family, exercise or walk the dogs.
Located centrally in Cowes to ensure you can walk to all that the main hub of Phillip Island has to offer.
Inspections are sure to impress!

Description:
Classic Cowes Beach House
Situated on a 582sqm approx. low maintenance allotment in Cowes, this classic beach house has been loved by the same family for many years. In a quiet location, with a perfect back lawn for afternoon cricket, it is the ideal place to start creating your own family memories.
With 3 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, and a spacious living area - complete with slow combustion fire - if its too cold for the beach, there is plenty of room for family gathering indoors, and the odd board game or two!
A spacious deck looks out to the rear yard, providing a great place for a barbeque. There is plenty of room for cars, boat and caravan, and a garden shed to store tools, bikes and surfboards.
The home comes fully furnished, ready to enjoy!
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
Quiet Court Location!
This neat as a pin 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom brick home is situated in the Blue Gum Estate in Cowes.
Positioned on a 678sqm approx. allotment toward the end of a quiet court, this established home has been well maintained and cared for by its current owner. The home was built by JG King, and is a steel frame construction.
The home itself features a generous sized master suite, including ensuite and walk in robe, 2 further bedrooms with built in robes, family bathroom, separate toilet and separate laundry. The living space offers a modern kitchen with stone benchtops, 900mm oven and hotplates, dishwasher and glass splashback. There are also 2 separate dining spaces - one being a cozy breakfast nook that opens out to the undercover pergola area, and a larger dining space which joins the living room.
Outside, the double garage offers internal access and single door access to the rear yard. There is also an allocated parking space to the left/front of the property, that would be ideal for parking a caravan or boat. A back yard is fully fenced, north facing and low maintenance.
Suitable for the investor, permanent or holiday buyer - being walking distance to Thompson Avenue, and close to schools and amenities.
This property for sale in Cowes is proudly presented by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island.

Description:
BRICK HOME BACKS ONTO NATURE RESERVE
What a great location! This 3 bedroom brick home is located in a quiet court offering complete privacy and with in easy access to Cowes shops, amenities and local primary School. The property offers a large open floor plan, 3 bedrooms,
master with a full ensuite, main bathroom and laundry facilities.
The nature reserve situated at the rear of the property is great place to access the nature reserve and just a short stroll to the Blue Gum reserve and the local primary school.
As you drive up you are greeted with a double carport to keep you dry and cool and an additional garage through the carport at the back of the property giving you plenty of room for you and boat and caravan, The large outdoor living space is a great place to enjoy the summer evenings.
All this on a child and pet friendly landscaped yard with plenty of room.
Contact Alex Scott & Staff Cowes on 5952 2633 to request a private inspection, you will not be disappointed.

Description:
Corner allotment in the Seagrove estate
This soon to be titled block of land is located in the prestigious Seagrove estate. The level 415m2 (approx.) block is a corner allotment allowing separate access to the rear of the block, ideal for storing the boat, caravan or extra cars, a must when living close to the ocean.
Enjoy the first class amenities this estate provides including 3 parks, playground, walking tracks and scenic lake, as well as piped LPG gas to the block, the only estate on Phillip Island to provide this service. All services including NBN, mains and recycled class A water, sewer, power and LPG gas are available.
Located only 700 metres to Cowes North facing bay beaches and walking distance to the Cowes shopping centre and schools. Enquire today.

Description:
Exceptional Living!
This near new, single level home is located in the Shoalhaven Estate, only a short walk or drive to the local safety beaches, shops and cafes of Cowes. The modern residence has a well-designed floor plan that will cater for all your needs.
Comprising of two living zones, four robed bedrooms and two bathrooms; the master is complete with a walk in robe and ensuite.
The open plan living, kitchen and dining area flows directly out onto the lovely and private undercover entertainment deck that overlooks the low maintenance surrounds.
With a host of additional features including split system heating and cooling units, carpet, tiles and vinyl flooring throughout, stainless steel appliances to the kitchen and plenty of open parking spaces.
All of this is set within a 580sqm approx. fully fenced allotment and currently has a tenancy in place.

Description:
RED ROCKS AREA - FULLY RENOVATED
This fully renovated brick home with golf course views and spectacular sunsets offers great value.
The home features a fully renovated kitchen with stone bench tops and glass splash backs, open plan living with polished timber floors, 2 large double bedrooms with BIR's and a study space that can be easily converted into a 3rd bedroom. A brand new bathroom is situated just off the laundry area.
The fully landscaped gardens together with 2 large garden sheds work well, and with the addition of a gate would be a child and pet friendly yard. A carport adds another outdoor room and is joined to the single lock up garage that provides all weather access into your new home.
If you've been looking for that special property that offers a country feel and is just a short stroll to a beautiful beach, then add this one to your list of 'must inspect'. Everything is done just move in and enjoy… Situated on approx. 572m2
Insights: 64 RED ROCKS ROAD, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 8 other 2 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Perfect Investment/Holiday Home
The perfect low maintence investment awaits. Nestled in this extremely quiet pocket of Cowes, there is excellent access to the Cowes foreshore which is just another feature to take advantage of. It is currently permanently let and could be vacant by settlement, but could easily be used for holiday rental or just enjoyed with family and friends. Park the car and walk to everything Cowes has to offer. The Cowes boat ramp is within minutes and this property has larger than normal storage for a jet ski or boat.

Description:
Charming Coastal Cottage Retreat
With the charming street appeal of a rose-lined picket fence, this delightful cottage style home, being sold fully furnished and situated on a corner allotment, is ideally positioned 450 metres (approx.) from the beach and just a few minutes' drive to the Cowes shopping precinct.
This beautifully presented home invites you to enjoy the space and light of a radiant open plan living room under dramatic 3metre high ceilings, with a centrepiece kitchen appointed with a new dishwasher and a built-in buffet. The master bedroom serves as a tranquil retreat with a corner spa bath in the ensuite, mirrored robes and lovely outlooks across the garden. A second bathroom features a shower, vanity and toilet as well as a generous laundry complete with built in cupboards and bench space. Sliding doors from the main living space and the meals area provide natural flow across to the gorgeous wraparound deck which overlooks the peaceful and picturesque garden including a shady olive grove with a hammock, and an abundance of fruit trees including plums, apricots, pears, figs, lemons, mandarins, loquats and almonds.
It's the perfect seaside property to let you relax and unwind, superbly located across from grazing pastures and ideally suited for either permanent living or as a fabulous holiday home/investment property with proven Airbnb rental history. Ready for summer holidays with 17 north facing solar panels with a 5Kw Bosch inverter, split system heating and cooling, rainwater tank with underground pipe connection to the vegetable garden, carport, concrete driveway and secure fencing for children and pets.
This property in Cowes is proudly presented to you by Ray White Real Estate Phillip Island
Insights: 48 Justice Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 63 other 3 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.

Description:
Guaranteed a peaceful and quiet lifestyle
Backing onto farm land, this lovely 3 bedroom home is located at the end of the street to ensure total privacy and tranquillity.
Offering 3 bedrooms, a central bathroom, laundry with outdoor access. With an open plan living/dining/kitchen area with outdoor patio area, it is perfect for entertaining.
Additional features include just a short walk to Justice Road Beach, a fully fenced backyard, 1 and a half car garage.
Currently a successful investment, enquire now to find out what it achieves in permanent rent.

Description:
Brand new and brilliant location
This brand new, stylish and exciting two storey home is situated within the heart of the magnificent Shearwater Estate in Cowes. Providing you with easy access to many of the lifestyle features the island is famous for. Just a short walk to Cowes golf course and the golden sandy beaches of Silverleaves. Close to playgrounds, parks and walking tracks making it the perfect location to enjoy your holidays or raise your family.
Locally built by GJ Gardner homes and colour selection by Darren Palmer, the home features large, open plan living and outdoor spaces, premium appliances and quality finishes throughout, six star energy efficiency including gas/solar hot water, double garage and situated on a 401 square metre corner allotment.
Suitable for permanent living or a brilliant investment opportunity for holiday or permanent rental. Contact us for an information pack detailing inclusions.
Insights: 1 Dunes Road, Cowes VIC 3922 was last sold in 2019 and 56 other 4 bedroom house in Cowes have recently been sold.
